Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: ehowe0214
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer and have been looking for a little point and shoot to carry around for convenience.  I want quality....but I do understand that any point and shoot is going to have some limitations.  It's wonderful to be able to grab the camera and shoot away without having to worry about settings.  The exposure compensation and scene modes will give you what you need for everyday fun photos.  I might even consider using this camera as a second camera for some of my professional photography. I spent quite a lot of time researching point and shoots.  I have Nikon professional cameras, so I do lean a little toward Nikon.  My daughter just purchased a pretty pricey Canon point and shoot..her pictures are below standard in my opinion compared to what I am able to capture with this little camera.Of course, you do have shutter lag....that's just a point and shoot....For the money this is a great little camera.  Thank you Nikon  :-)

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Lisa A.
Reviews.Content: When I finally made the leap from film to digital camera I searched for a long time for just the right camera for me. In fact I had another camera saved on my wish list so long that when I compared this camera to the saved one, this one had better features on every point! I love the ease of just pointing and shooting and still getting wonderful pictures. I recently went to NYC and took a bunch of pictures and only had to delete one! Transferring pictures to my computer is also a breeze. I wholeheartedly recommend this camera to someone looking for an easy to use point and shoot camera that takes beautiful pictures!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because it wasn't that expensive and I loved the color. The picture quality is better than I expected and I wanted a camera that had a video app as well. It works great, I would highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Serventi
Reviews.Content: My wife and daughter took this camera with them when they went to Kenya on a mission trip.  They also took a high end SLR, and I am having a hard time telling which camera took which picture...pretty cool!

Reviews.Title: Shutter lag differs with inside and outside pictures
Reviews.Author: Rcvig
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it had good reviews, it stated it took professional type pictures at the zoo. But I had one big problem with it. Even though the quality is great, the shutter lag (time between pressing the button and when it actually takes the shot) when taking pictures indoors is too long. Outside theres hardly a noticable delay. And because I bought it to take pictures of puppies, it was quite frustrating, as the little guys tend to move alot. Also the delay between pictures is longer than I'd like, after the flash I get the full attention of my little subjects only as long as the delay. Some of its good qualities are if you forget to put a camera card in, you have the option to transfer photos from camera to card. It also has a touch screen, so when getting your subjects prepaired for a picture you can just tap the screen to shoot. I know I need a more expensive camera but can't afford it, so with some practice I was still able to get some really good shots.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Roxy "Roxy"
Reviews.Content: I bought the more expensive Nikon Coolpix a few months before for almost 3 times the money.  I hated it, and began using my previous Nikon Coolpix that had cracked.  Then, I happen to see this one and for the cheap price, I took a gamble.  It works great.  I love how easy it is to use (the other one kept accidentally taking photos and was very hard to open and close).  This one is smaller and much easier to use.  I never did find the video button on my expensive Nikon, but this one is right on the front.Also, I love the zoom feature.  I've never seen one that is so easy to use and has access to this feature right on the front top right of camera.  You can zoom in and out while you are taking videos too.  And, when playing back the photos, in order to view them closer, simply move your finger over the same zoom button.  It's very light weight and fits into the pocket of my purse.

Reviews.Title: Little Coolpix "plumb"works for me
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Have had it about five months. Took it and an older Canon that is a few steps up technologically on a road triptrip - New Mexico, Colorado, Utah, Arizona. Used the Canon's viewfinder in the sun. Coolpix worked great taking video and snapshots from a moving car. No problems.

Reviews.Title: Lasted Two Days
Reviews.Author: Shannon J. Steele
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for me as a gift so that I could have a small,portable point & shoot camera in addition to my Nikon D40 DSLR (which I love).  Unfortunately, I didn't use it until just after the 30 day return policy was up.  On the third day of a family vacation, after using it for two days, I pulled it out from the safety of my camera bag to use it, and turned the power on.  The screen showed a lens error, then it immediately powered down.  A friend, who assembles computers for a living,couldn't even get it to work.  About the only thing that I might have done to cause the lens error was that there was a small piece of fuzz from the camera bag in the lens, that I removed following the lens error.  The day before, I dropped it from a distance no greater than 15 inches, but a camera should not be so fragile that it can't handle an occasional minor drop or two. I am convinced that the camera was poorly constructed from the start.  After my vacation, when I looked at the pictures taken on the first two days with it, several of them had half of the picture missing, as if the shutter was stuck.When the camera was "working," I was frustrated with the fact that I could take pictures by touching the screen; I found this very annoying as I accidentally took several pictures of my shirt, the ground, etc.I am extremely disappointed in the lack of quality from this Nikon camera.  I cannot afford to keep buying $130 one-use cameras, so I will never buy another Nikon point & shoot camera.  My kids have Canon Powershots that have lasted for 3 years so far.Camera was not purchased from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Touchscreen - Menu's are sometimes hard to understand
Reviews.Author: DC in CT
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great.  A variety of options and extrremely long battery life.  The onscreenmenu's could be easier to understand.  The manual that is on disc is very thorough though.  Fairly easy to use, compact and even takes pretty good video.

Reviews.Title: Beware!  Coolpix S4300
Reviews.Author: T. Woods
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter 11/30/2012. I gave the camera to my daughter on Xmas day. She used the camera approximately two weeks. At this time the camera ceased to work. Of course the 30 days are up, even though she has only used it two weeks. The camera is now enroute to be repaired. I think a new product is in order, not a repaired camera.Oh yeah! Be prepared to pay all postage, and handling to return your defective product.I received my camera back today 01/28/2013! The camera is still non-functional, same issues. I now have to send this new product back again. Customer service is as non- functional as their product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: Item shipped on time, in perfect condition, everything in the box that you need to start taking pictures.  Since this is a 16MP camera I suggest larger SD disk.

Reviews.Title: Wifes Purple camera review
Reviews.Author: pat curry
Reviews.Content: I chose 4 stars because there is always room for improvement in anything a person purchases. Therefore 4 stars to me means way above average. I like this camera I bought for my wife for the ease of use and pretty much mistake proof use. It is very easy to meander through the menu(the icons could really be replaced by words though) by scrolling through the icons until you find what you need. A great camera so far. The touch screen is a plus. Time remains to be told as far as the lifetime and usefullness of the screen before it becomes unviewable though. Send me another request in a year or so on that last concern and we'll cover that.

Reviews.Title: Save your money - terrible battery life!
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: I use a Nikon D80 and D3000 to shoot professional pictures & love both cameras. When it came time to supplement with a point and shoot - I obviously leaned toward Nikon for this reason. I purchased this camera for a great price on sale at another store & brought it home to set it up. I should have stopped there.CONS:- TERRIBLE BATTERY LIFE!!!! Used camera on vacation this weekend. After about 1.5 hours the camera was almost dead (the battery had been charged to full the evening before). I even had the camera set to shut down after 1 minute of not being used to save battery life. I was only able to take about 60 pictures before camera died. If you want a camera that will last all day without charging...absolutely do not buy this camera.- During setup I thought I would honestly break the screen. Buttons do not want to push without using stylus which is incredibly inconvenient. Also hard to cycle through pictures you've already taken.- Display screen would only show me the video recording minutes I had left - will not show me how many exposures/pictures I have left on SD card. Called Nikon & after being on hold while rep researched, was told that "once you have less than 100 pictures left - the screen will tell you." Um? Not helpful or as advertised.- Picture quality is not very good. Outside with full lighting - it is fine, but indoors is just terrible - even with flash!- "Auto Scene" mode almost always picks "macro" for every picture - even when trying to shoot landscape far away. Not a very good feature.- Stylus hanging from camera strap is extremely annoying & could potentially scratch camera when in casePROS:- Outdoor pictures are really pretty good- Lots of options for scene mode - although cumbersome to get there on menu.- Pretty decent deal for the price- Small/lightweightI am headed back to the store today to return this camera & look for something else. I really wanted to like this camera, but just couldn't. I will pay a little more for better features or look at another brand (definitely not with a touch screen).

Reviews.Title: better than what i expected!
Reviews.Author: rubberduck1241
Reviews.Content: i got this camera as a birthday present from my mom when we went to figure out what camera i wanted we were in Walmart little did i know it was touch screen! when i got home and found out it was i was super excited! everything is easy to use! and in all my experiences of cameras this is the best! it takes amazing pictures! i absolutely love it!! and i have even dropped it a couple of times and it has been outside in freezing cold while i took pictures and even a little water and it still held up! i highly recommend this camera!! i have no problem with this camera at all!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4300 16mp Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: Really like the camera alot -- I play Agility with my dgos and took it to an agility trial over this past weekend - takes great stills and very nice video - was quite pleased and impressed with the camera.  HOWEVER -- the battery is another story - it came semi charged and worked while I was learning how to use the camera. After charging the battery for two days, took it to a wedding the following weekend and it stopped working -- did not get to take all the pictures I wanted!  Had a neighbor test the battery in her Nikon Coolpix camera ( to make sure it was indeed the battery and not the camera)  -- the battery is totally dead, will not charge - so will be sending this back to Amazon.  I had read about the batteries being bad on previous models of the camera, but purchased it anyhow as I really liked my neighbors camera.  Beware of the batteries !!

Reviews.Title: Would work great if battery would charge
Reviews.Author: chicvibe
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after my other nikon coolpix s3000 stopped charging (after one year).  I am an idiot.  I got to use this camera one day before it wouldn't work again.  I expect better from this company.  I googled and the issue is rampant with a lot of coolpix cameras.  Avoid if you can.  I am trying to make this camera work by finding other means of charging the battery, other than leaving it in the camera to charge while plugged in (because that doesn't work no matter where (with computer or wall outlet), but haven't found the right external battery charger yet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera.
Reviews.Author: edward romer
Reviews.Content: Great deal. Used discounts, coupons and promos and got camera for just about half of the Walmart price. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Cole "Nic"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my husband for his birthday, it takes great pictures and is light enough that he doesn't mind carrying it around.  He loves that it's small enough to fit in his pocket, and easy enough to use that he can whip it out and take a picture in seconds.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: David L. Iacono
Reviews.Content: I wanted to buy a small shove in your pocket camera , not spend a lot of money. well S4300 was one on my list Costco had one left for $100 so bought it.  So after being totally confused reading articles on what to look for and nothing seemed perfect in any reviews I just bought one.  The  S4300  works really well takes great pictures , feels solid and looks good and fits my needs. I did buy an additional charger ( make sure it's for the S4300 not the 4300) battery and 16GB san-disk.  So it's good camera to consider  for the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Fernando Ferrari
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent, takes very nice pictures and scene modes as well exploit the effects too.Tactail screen can sometimes complicate matters, but it is about adapting. The only negative that I find, is that the battery charge is at the bottom, which makes have to stop lying on the front or the screen, it certainly makes scratches easily.Then to see the pictures on TV, is half troublesome, because it does a good fit to the screen and passing them to go with the touch interface goes sometimes.For the price it is a great camera to get and renew the old.The video is acceptable. undoubtedly recommend it.regards

Reviews.Title: Short battery life the only downer
Reviews.Author: L. Lombardi "doingmybest"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot. It takes amazing photos and videos. I put a 32g data card in it and it works great. But on my trip overseas, the battery died mid-day every day. To me it died way too soon for the given amount of photos I had taken. I almost returned it, but instead opted to buy two backup batteries and keep them charged and with me. This is not the type of battery you can buy in a grocery store in Brussels!

Reviews.Title: Not bad, not great
Reviews.Author: ClutzyJ
Reviews.Content: So, I do like the camera.  However, when you take a picture it shows you the photo but is loading/saving it for 30+ seconds, a pain in the butt.  It does not take simultaneous photos... if you put it in sport mode it does take multiple photos but seconds apart so it's virtually the same photo.  I would prefer it if it had a slight delay not right after of 30+seconds later.  Very crisp photos though.  I'd like to return it for a different camera but i don't think that's allowed.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Ashley L. Medlen
Reviews.Content: Slow to take pictures and the battery compartment would not stay closed. Picture quality was good when I did get the shot.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: HJopeful
Reviews.Content: I had a previous Nikon and loved it. Still have it. I needed a camera with wider optics and this works well, due to the type of photos I take.

Reviews.Title: GREAT pictures, but not User friendly !!
Reviews.Author: KCpurchaser
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from the Staples store before going to a concert. I usually buy CANON cameras because they are much more user-friendly. But the store didn't have the one I wanted to I bought the NIKON. It took me about 2 hours of taking pictures to figure out which modes would work best for taking pictures of the artist on the stage. The pictures came out WONDERFUL, and I was able to zoom in completely, focus the camera, and THEN shoot the video so that it could come out clear from far away. It was crazy how much I had to play with it in order to figure it out. I would have preferred something much EASIER. I really loved the pictures I got out of this, and the video was not too bad either. The sound quality was good but not great. The touch screen was a bit lagging. The settings were hiding all over the options choices. They are confusing names on the options. This camera is annoying, and the battery ran out in 3 hours... though I'm not sure if this is normal for these types of cameras. It was also aggravating that the battery must be charged while its inside the camera. RIDICULOUS. I should be able to charge it externally. I am a pretty savvy user of cameras and have had many of them over the years. So I was really discouraged when I had to use this one for hours before I could find the settings I needed. I am returning this to the store ASAP and trying out the CANON camera I wanted in the first place.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I'm glad I purchased this camera.  Almost didn't because of some of the bad reviews.  The touch screen is awesome on this camera.  It comes with a stylus for you to use..  You can't use it  like a cell phone touch screen..  You HAVE to use the stylus or your fingernail.  It takes excellent pictures outside..  I'm still learning how to use it I've only had it for a short time.  I'm planning on practicing until October and then I'm taking it with me to Bermuda..  Hopefully I will have worked out all the kinks by then.All in all, awesome camera I would recommend, especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Fit my needs in every way.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: Compact, easy to use, and takes great pics. Easy to carry anywhere, and hardly notice it. My other camera will collect dust now lol.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: bookworm1026
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! takes beautiful pictures, i took it with me to new mexico and we went in Carlsbad caverns and I got better pictures than anyone else. So clear!!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: NJ Observer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for use when snowmobiling or other outdoor sports to not risk my best equipment. Great value for the price, does what I needed it to do.

Reviews.Title: Excelents
Reviews.Author: patricia gomez
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto de acuerdo a lo esperado, el envío fue acorde a la fecha señalada, estoy muy satisfecha con el producto, lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Luis Morales
Reviews.Content: La cámara es excelente, pequeña, liviana y potente, llegó a tiempo y trajo todo lo que ofrecían en la publicidad. Recomiendo 100 % este articulo.

Reviews.Title: Cameras
Reviews.Author: Nathan Thomas "Night Hawk"
Reviews.Content: Very good for carrying when you have to much luggage. I like this camera for it's clarity and because it is a light load. As a photographer I carry a ton of equipment but every so offten this camera does the job and provides me with simple solution and because it is 16 megapixals the finished product is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: great product 100% recomendation
Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: great product. 100% satisfy  :)  touchscreen is a great idea. Easy to use. great movie quality, great picture quality. very slim

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera
Reviews.Author: C. Schweitzer "all2neat"
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my wife for Christmas and we both really like it. It takes good clear pictures and has many settings to help out. I like the fact that the screen is touch screen so it can help you focus a picture. the zoom for a camera this size is really good. Unfortunately our toddler also loved this camera and threw it in the washing machine unknowingly to us. We would buy this camera again though it seems to be hard to find.

Reviews.Title: How do you get the computer to recognize this camera
Reviews.Author: Esau's Message
Reviews.Content: I cannot get my computer to recognize the camera from any USB slot. That includes using View NX2. I have to remove the flash drive and install it in the computer before I can retrieve pictures. This truly sucks and I've not figured out any way to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix is Cool
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: I love my new Nikon.  It's small and easy to carry.  The case is perfect and provides great protection.  This camera is much easier for me to use than my last one by Sony.

Reviews.Title: Nikon's Little Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: For all those people who won't read reviews that don't have the 'Verified Purchase' stamp, let me tell you this little story. I bought this camera in white almost two weeks ago. I had some trouble with the touchscreen so I decided to find out some information about international returns. I spoke to Ruslyn, a very competent customer service representative who suggested that I pay to return the item to them, since the camera had a defect, and they will refund my money for the camera or send a replacement as well as refund me the cost of the return shipping. Before I finished the conversation, the power went off.The next day I spoke to another customer representative, Taneisha, who I believe only has that job because she knows someone who deals with hiring employees. She basically told me that since I don't live in the US, I would have to pay for the return shipping. I proceeded to paste to her their policy on international returns and asked her if they had changed. After about ten minutes, she told me that they hadn't changed, but something of their fault would be me not a defective product, but only if I had received the wrong item."A fault of amazon meaning if we send you the wrong item."  -Taneisha..what?In any case, I told her that I had spoken to a rep (Ruslyn) the day before and I was told that Amazon would handle the return shipping. I pay then and they would refund it to me once the item was received."Thanks for holding, i went back to my supervisor with the chat from the previous agent and being that you were told that we would refund the return shipping, we will make a one time exception and refund the shipping once the item gets back to us."I had no problem with this. She asked me when I was planning on returning the item and I said tomorrow, which would have been Wednesday. Early Wednesday morning I get an email from Amazon with the subject:"Your Amazon Account Has Been Closed.""Hello,A careful review of your account indicates that you've requested refunds on a majority of your orders for a variety of reasons."I have NO idea what 'refunds' Amazon was referring to. NO idea.My theory is that they felt it would've been better for them to just close my account instead of paying the cost of my return shipping. Since my account was closed, there is not no way for me to return it. It's also the reason why I don't have the 'Verified Purchase' stamp. To add insult to injury, they still send me emails selling me that I have unclaimed Amazon MP3 credit.Now on to the review.My last camera was a Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W560 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) which I absolutely LOVE. The clarity of the photos. The sleek, shiny body with the gorgeous 3 inch display. The novelty of the sweep panorama feature. The beautiful high definition video. Instead of playing it safe and going with the new Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model), chose to go another route and try the Nikon Coolpix S4300 and I must say...I feel as if I made a big mistake.Though I had some issues with mine, the touch screen interface seems smooth but not as user friendly as you would think. The photos come out crisp and clear sometimes, but othertime, they're noisy from top to bottom. Low light shots are fairly good in the correct setting; I was pleasantly surprised.The auto-mode is a big disappoint. The camera seems as if it rarely wants to use flash..sometimes it makes me wonder. The quality of the display is advertised as 460 dots but the pixels are annoyingly visible. You see this almost plaid-like pattern in the display. It is beautiful but not much better than the Sony's 230k dot resolution.Video mode seemed decent from the screen, I felt as if since the display is low quality, that the videos would be beautiful in reality. No such luck. I played them on my HDTV and, to be honest, it was on par with the HD videos produced my the Apple iPod touch 8GB (4th Generation) - Black - Current Version. In other words...it's not good. You also cannot use optical zoom and record audio at the same time. The autofocus also isn't that reliable.On the plus side, touch shooting is a fun feature, and using the swipe of a finger to go through your photos is a great touch. What I've discovered is that touch shooting seems to be disabled when shooting in some scenes. Having 6x zoom is also nice though when zoomed all the way in, it's nearly impossible to get a clear, sharp shot. The one touch video button is also really useful.Overall, it is a decent point and shoot camera. I bought it for $99.00 on sale. I wouldn't recommend buying it for more than that. I would recommend the new Sony Cybershot W650 over this. Aside from having less zooming capabilities, it's a better camera in many aspects.

Reviews.Title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: I previously gave this camera 5 stars, but the battery ran out after not even 1 hour!! It was my son's wedding!! Fortunately I had ordered a battery charger and battery. My new battery lasted ALL night long, and was still fully charged in the wee hours when the wedding ended. My battery that came with my Nikon camera said it was fully charged when I put it on the charger, but was TOTALLY dead when I put it in the camera. I tried charging it with the charger that came with the camera and it STILL was dead!! When I read the reviews about the camera a bunch of them said that the battery ran out fast. I gave this 5 stars originally because it said the battery was fully charged. Now I know what everyone was talking about, and just had to throw the battery away.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Jill A. Davis
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera!!! I have nothing bad to say about it! Buy this camera if you're looking for something simple with good quality. Battery lasts a long time!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MRadigan
Reviews.Content: Crisp clear pictures. Easy to operate.  I had one and loved it so I bought this one for my husband.

Reviews.Title: Yep love it
Reviews.Author: Rachel Snoeyink
Reviews.Content: I love it the pictures are very clear and the battery lasts a long time too I would definitely recommend this

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: R. Gillis
Reviews.Content: I am no expert. I just needed a small compact point and shoot camera. This thing takes really nice photos. Very easy to use. Decent optical zoom to get you relatively close to whatever you are shooting. No regrets on this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever for the price
Reviews.Author: Evan Firestone
Reviews.Content: Compact, LONG lasting battery...still on full charge after 2 months, internal memory from 10 to 16 pictures, no waiting for the camera to take picture, instant.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: HCM
Reviews.Content: Great camera! My daughter wanted a fun camera and this is it! A lot of picture options and the touch screen is very responsive.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Duane Linke
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a great price very easy to use. The features were easy to learn. Takes great pictures AWESOME

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Braddy_Bhasker
Reviews.Content: Liked the Nikon S4300 for its picture clarity, quick response and touch screen.Touch screen still would require improvement, overall this is worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Use this all the time
Reviews.Author: New One
Reviews.Content: Love my camera. Takes beautiful photos and no other camera compares. Happy with my purchase. Love it. Use it all the time

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Anthony Losinno
Reviews.Content: Excellent value, fast shipping, and a quality camera for a great price. This is a perfect camera for every day use. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Terrific pocket camera
Reviews.Author: M. Miller
Reviews.Content: Replaced an earlier model of this Nikon CoolPix camera when the lens extension/retraction mechanism went Tango Uniform. Amazed at all the new features yet it's still simple to use and produces excellent images.

Reviews.Title: Hopeless
Reviews.Author: Water Man
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera just prior to going out of country for 6 months.  I took 10 photos in the USA than 20 more in Mexico and from that 10th day I had it the lense would not extend outward to permit taking pictures. Camera shops in Mexico and then in the USA on my return home after 6 months had no idea how to fix it. It was quite a disappointment to take a new camera for an adventure and it failed near instantly.

Reviews.Title: The best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a touch screen camera for a long time and when I found one on Amazon at this price, I couldn't resist! It was unfortunate that I couldn't get the color I wanted, but I have had no problem with the camera. Just make sure you buy a memory card when you order it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Karen F. Hewson
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, the pictures are sharp, easy to download pics onto computer and very compact, I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and great Photos
Reviews.Author: Paul R.
Reviews.Content: Very Good Photos and easy to use.  I enjoyed using itsmall and compact for easy storage and carrying.  A+

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Char21
Reviews.Content: I needed something in addition to my phone, not to use my battery.  This isgreat touch screen!  I would recommend this as user friendly!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Cat in the Hat
Reviews.Content: I have several large cameras with long, clunky lenses.  I was looking for a camera small enough for a pocket or small bag.  The CoolPix is perfect for that.  The photographs are crisp and clean.  I would recommend this for any age.

Reviews.Title: It meets my needs
Reviews.Author: Oneida Nearing
Reviews.Content: It is small and easy to use.  I'm not an English major so I don't have a lot to say.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: onomonotia
Reviews.Content: Awesome point and shoot camera. A great price for a sturdy little thing! Takes great pictures and the color is exactly like the picture

Reviews.Title: best camera i have owned
Reviews.Author: maer
Reviews.Content: So just to start this off i want to say i have had this camera for close to 2 years now this is by far the best camera i have ever owned. It takes a nice clean picture and the video quality is amazing. The touch screen is sensitive and its is very user friendly. The biggest let down i would say is the battery is a little hard to understand it is very unclear as to where it is, i never know how long i have left. This however can easily be fixed, i carry an extra battery and i have no problem. Another thing to keep in mind is that it has the capability to take 16 megapixel pictures, but as it happens i never set it higher than 8. 8 megapixels is usually more than enough since i am not making posters, but if you are its good for that as well. Overall i would definitely recommend it anyone that is on the edge, or that read one of the bad reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Benedict G. Harucki
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera to shoot at great price! Love it with wide screen and able to zoom in or out on sceeen!

Reviews.Title: A 5 Star Winner
Reviews.Author: sharon Townley
Reviews.Content: This little camera is very user friendly.  It produces high quality pictures, is very lightweight, and is a great value. I would highly recommend it for a beginner photographer.

Reviews.Title: Love the touch screen
Reviews.Author: sharon wiseman
Reviews.Content: I love the touch screen and how small this camera is.  Takes nice pictures and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.....
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Flanagan Jr
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this camera to use for work, images are clear, very easy to use and easy to carry with it's small size. Now starting to use it for personal when it is not always convenient to carry our Nikon 3100.

Reviews.Title: Really a "capable" shirt pocket camera.
Reviews.Author: R. Young
Reviews.Content: If anything it has more features than your average photo-taker would need.  Touch scree is superb. My 11 year old granddaughter showed us grandparents how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use!
Reviews.Author: Mike in Al
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I assumed it would be simple to use. I was correct. The touch screen puts all the most used controls just a touch away. Quick and easy to use, it fits my needs perfectly. It powers up and focuses quickly. Picture quality is very good for my use.

Reviews.Title: LOSGZZ
Reviews.Author: Jose Gilberto Gonzalez Argote
Reviews.Content: This camera is really cool especially TOUCH SCREEN, color, style, and takes very nice photos ... RECOMMENDBUY THIS CAMERA

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my duaghter, Loves it! Kids love that touch screen.
Reviews.Author: M. Cronkite "Working Mom"
Reviews.Content: I would not mind having one myself for a pocket camera. Lugging the T3i around is always a worry. Though I love my T3i, I always afraid of it getting stolen if I leave it in the car etc. And its not there when that picture you could have took pops up! No complaints on the pictures from the Nikon so far.

Reviews.Title: good camer
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Echenique
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT CAMERAis an excellent camera I received it in very good condition, excellent brand, buenisimo shipping was fast and I am very happy with the purchase I recommend for that reason I give it 6 stars thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolppix S4300 16 Digital Camera with 6x Zoom Nikkor Glass
Reviews.Author: Colorado Joanne
Reviews.Content: I'm still trying to get use to it.  The touchscreen makes it a bit different and so many options. Right at the moment I am regretting not having my old Nikon Coolpix 7600 repaired. I thought it would be more cost efficient to buy a new one.  I liked the idea of  being able to recharge it and not having to bother with batteries.  I am sure I will get use to it--I just have to use it more!  I do like the Nikon and have an old 35mm one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Tee B
Reviews.Content: So I was kinda skeptical about this camera after reading a few reviews, but I am SO glad I purchased anyway.  I have not experienced the lag time between taking pics.  It's actually rather fast.  The picture quality is unbelievable!  I always keep it in my purse for those just in case moments, and the battery stays charge for at least a week with minimal use.  For the price, you can't go wrong.  GET THIS CAMERA!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera....horrible battery
Reviews.Author: macgirl4ever
Reviews.Content: The battery that comes with this camera is horrible.  I was able to eek out four months of use before it stopped charging.  I bought a third party battery and haven't had any issues.

Reviews.Title: The Perfect Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Mom to Twins
Reviews.Content: I purchased the silver Nikon Coolpix S4300 after a little research. I was looking for a camera to replace a simple Olympus digital camera I received as a bonus through Scholastic Book Clubs. I wanted something similar, but more modern, as that camera was several years old when it finally died. I love that the Nikon has a large touch screen. That definitely makes it a little easier to find menu options.I have not read the directions that came along with the camera. I'm more of a, "Let's push this button and see what happens" type person! This is a very simple camera to use. The crispness of the photos is amazing. It far exceeds my old Olympus! I recently took a few photos at a local zoo. The fact that it took such wonderful, colorful, vivid, clear photos of the lizards inside their glass enclosures in a darkened room amazed me. My old camera would never do that.I purchased this camera for everyday use. I am a teacher and needed a simple, CHEAP camera to use at school and leave in my bag or purse for convenience. I think I found just that in the Nikon S4300. I will admit that I really was drawn to the red camera, but when it came down to it, price won out. The silver version was almost HALF the price of the others. After some comparison shopping, I committed to the silver because of the tremendous deal, just under $70! I could not find a camera with even half the qualify and value of this one for a similar price.

Reviews.Title: Great Nikon
Reviews.Author: R. Laiken
Reviews.Content: I received my S4300 a little while ago and I am very impressed so far.  Setup is easy, the touch screen is great and the build quality appears to be very good - a solid little camera.  I took some indoor shots and they came out great so reasonably low light is not an issue. It's small but not too small to be able to take great pictures easily and carry in your pocket.  I got the Case Logic UNZB202 carry case to protect it and it fits perfectly and is small enough to stick in your pocket without adding bulk.  I have a Nikon DSLR and set reasonable expectations for a point-and-shoot digital.  For the price and what you get - I think it's a wise purchase.  I expect I will take many more pictures now that I have a good camera that is so portable.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera! it is so easy to use and small enough to fit in my purse. It also takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Easy to operate for being OLD, BLONDE and Techno illeriate  LOL
Reviews.Author: Lorraine P Nellis
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to get started taking pictures. I am sooo pleased with this camera. The kit came with a stylus, charger, usb cord. great...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Sekyanzi "srichard"
Reviews.Content: it works great and it  is fast with pics i like it since i wanted a touch screen and this is great .

Reviews.Title: Great, compact, everyday camera!!
Reviews.Author: NK
Reviews.Content: This is the second nikon coolpix s4300 that I have purchased in the past 6 months (only bc my daughter dropped my last one).  I bought this one because my sister had bought one just a few weeks before the first one I bought.  I absolutely love the touch screen and the pictures turn out pretty crisp.  There is some lag time with shutter between pics, but that is with almost any point and shoot.  All in all it is a great camera, I also love the color editing option, very cool :)

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: NICE size fun to use . Easy clean crisp pic. Vary easy to use. Fast to charge and hold its charge for along time. Try it you will love it.

Reviews.Title: The only one brand that I want for Cameras
Reviews.Author: Agustin
Reviews.Content: Hello! I'm from Nicaragua I did receive this camera in August'12 I was very exited I had a another Nikon and had a very good experience with it, so I did decide to buy a new one because the other one was too old (over 4 years) I broke the display and over Nicaragua is too hard try to get replacement parts, the best option is buy a new cameraPro: This camera is very light, a very comfortable touche screen, has a very good mode for HD videos, very clear and quality images like just Nikon can do!Cons: Is a shame that every video on HD only can last 8 minutes so you have to stop and start to record other video if you get over 8 minutes, the problem is that you some time lost some good moments that you want on video.Is a very good camera and I will buy it again, definitely Nikon is the only one brand of camera that I want to use!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Janice R. Devalk "Jan DeValk"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the price.  I am very pleased with the brilliance, colors and clarity of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Eli Smith
Reviews.Content: this product is amazing i purchased this item a few days ago at costco and so far great it has all these cool features like fisheye and a bunch of other effects this item is great buy it

Reviews.Title: Sold a Display model- NOT NEW!
Reviews.Author: H.A.B
Reviews.Content: So- I have had the camera awhile and noticed that it was kind of slow, but figured that's okay because it's cheap. I JUST now turned the camera on without a memory card and found out that there were pictures taken BEFORE I bought the camera.. Guess what I saw- many pictures of around what I believe to be an Office Depot store- and a picture of the other DISPLAY MODEL cameras. If I would have known I was buying a DISPLAY MODEL camera I would have NEVER EVER EVER bought it. That is ridiculous! I was under the impression I was buying a brand new camera. This makes me extremely nervous to buy anything that isn't directly coming from Amazon. Please, feel free to be ashamed of yourself for trying to pass this off as a new camera. No wonder the damn thing is so slow- it's had the hands of a 100 people on it before me. Yuck! Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: S4300
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Thornhill
Reviews.Content: This is great little camera.  I didn't read manual but discovered lot  of great features on the touch screen and the touch screen works most of the time unlike others...Bought it on sale and was definitely worth the price bought it for...

Reviews.Title: Only Useful in Well Lit Areas.
Reviews.Author: TurquoiseTigerKat
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend got me this Camera for my birthday through New Egg and I was super excited about getting a new camera (mine had been stolen last Christmas along with my purse). I took it to my sister's wedding 5 days later and attempted to use the "party/indoor" setting. Every single picture taken came out like it was a 1.5 megapixel camera and the battery died in an hour after being charged all night long. I called Nikon and they basically told me I was an idiot who didn't know how to use a camera. The touch screen started changing settings on it's own and was taking pictures by itself.We wrote to New Egg and they replaced the camera with a new one a week later. The new camera has worked great, when used outside on an outside setting in a well lit area. The battery has lasted weeks at a time in between charges.I recently took this camera to his cousin's wedding where I attempted to use the "party/indoor" setting again. The pictures came out blurry, awful and they look like a 1.5 megapixel setting.I don't blame my boyfriend for his choice, after all he doesn't just buy electronics, he researches them long before he decides to purchase. I feel bad when he's sitting right there and I start having difficulties with this camera as he bought it for me.I had told my boyfriend not to get me a Kodak (even though I love Kodak) because I had read they would be going out of business or filing for bankruptcy. I didn't want an Olympus and I was going back and forth between Cannon and Nikon. I should've just asked for a new Kodak.Needless to say, I thought Nikon was supposed to be a good brand, guess it only qualifies when you get the $1500 camera as opposed to the $300 camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Quality Has Not Changed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I last owned a Nikon camera about 15 year ago.  The screen failed soon after I bought it.  I decided to give them another chance and bought this camera.  The screen failed in two weeks.  Lost the pictures that were stored in internal memory.  My Panasonic Lumix has been going strong for 10 years without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Poor camera
Reviews.Author: Brittany LeBaron
Reviews.Content: The camera's images are not crisp at all and forget taking pictures of children without them being blurred.  Returned this product.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4300 16 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: PMarquardt
Reviews.Content: The cover door for SD card and battery does not stay shut.  If it wasn't such a hassle and cost for returning, that's just what I would have done.  After my purchase I found the camera I thought I was getting in a department store.  It pays to shop around.  Convenience isn't always convenient.  I was expecting a bright purple color like the picture but it is very dull. (doesn't effect quality of pic)

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: erwin
Reviews.Content: Good quality, it was as we expected and we can recommend it. I will buy again if we need anothe one.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera!
Reviews.Author: Denise Pulfer
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera for a quick toss in the bag and shoot a quick pic!  It is slim and works great!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Keyth Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Bough this for my girlfriends mom for her birthday, she is not a tech type person. She was able to turn the camera on and take pictures right away.Only Downside I saw was the rechargeable battery, would have been nice to take AA or AAA

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the Memories
Reviews.Author: Lach Kincaid
Reviews.Content: This camera is an earlier CooPix model.  We had one for several years and liked it. After passing it on we decided to replace the old one with the same camera.  "Familiarity breeds Contentment"

Reviews.Title: battery life too short
Reviews.Author: Tameka Marshall Dennis
Reviews.Content: This camera does not take nice pictures ........and the battery life is very poor. Would not recommend anyone to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Travel light
Reviews.Author: Prince Ken
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and download to computer. It's especially good for traveling because it's light and compact. I like the touch screen feature. Outdoor, natural light is better than indoor flash pictures. Even a little light in the background can "fool" the sensor resulting in unsatisfactory contrast. Picture quality is better than smart phone. Works best for objects less than 100 feet away.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Gwenda Washington
Reviews.Content: I love the way this camera takes pictures. My first one my husband dropped it while we were on a Washington, DC trip so I look on-line at Amazon and found the exact one but a grade higher and the price was very,very compatible.

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Malissa Starkey
Reviews.Content: This is actually my 4 camera I take lots of pictures good quality user friendly I have my camera on me 24 7 my family & friends know they will be having their picture taken if Im around

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: george howard
Reviews.Content: ordered to replalce a lost camera. works well, takes great pix and easy to use, so have no complaints so far

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Gina Rhodes
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, took it all over England. If you are looking for a camera that's easy to carry but not to small this is the one. Really nice clear photos. Sorry I have not used the video yet so no comment.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX S4300
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA NIKON COOLPIX S4300 16 MP DIGITAL CAMERA, TAKES GREAT PICTURES, PLEASED WITHCAMERA ..PERFECT FOR MY USE, AAAAAAAAA++++++++

Reviews.Title: Touch screen Action
Reviews.Author: Chandra
Reviews.Content: Yes, purchased for touch screen, easy, great pictures. Would recommend this product to family & friends. It will greatly used and appreciated!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Really Disappointing Camera
Reviews.Author: Courtney Wallin
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this camera over a year ago from a brick & mortar store after the battery charger for our Sony finally died.  i was exciting to try out the Nikon, but I was really disappointed.  The touch screen is always tempermental and makes showing photos to the family and older not so tech savvy grandmothers a pain in the butt.My biggest disappointment was while taking pictures of my kids for our Christmas card.  Every picture without the flash was blurry, and with the flash I couldn't get the glow of the Christmas lights like I had in the past.  Also the shutter was too slow for my kids.  Once I got them to smile at me, clicked the shutter and the photo actually took they were already past the smile and out of their seats running around the tree. I was finally able to get something usable in sports mode, but even then the pictures were still fuzzy.  With our previous Sony Cybershot, I could get excellent photos without the flash in a normal mode.  Every 3rd shot would be fuzzy, but I would just keep clicking until I got something useable.  With this Nikon, it took an hour of coraling kids before I got one useable shot.

Reviews.Title: Graet !!!!
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: This was bought for my wife , and she loves it!!!!  I was very pleased with the packaging, The time it took to get here  . very thing about was great  !!!! the best over all was the PRICE !!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Linda H.
Reviews.Content: This is my second coolpix camera in two years. The first one was a real lemon and I should have sent it back but I kept coddling it along until I became tired of doing that.  So far so good with this model.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: Kar Dell "spiceumup"
Reviews.Content: I really love this little camera.  Recharges on the USB, holds a charge, nice sharp pictures and all the functions are easy to use.small enough to fit comfortably in a pocket, it still is comfortable to hold in big hands.  The 16 mp give very detailed and sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: For me
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: It works great and use it often. I bought it as a replacement for my ebay selling  all it said it was

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: student
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice for the  price.  It can easily fit it in my pants pocket and this is very convenient.Indoor photos are good enough but not great.  The photos indoors are a little dark and miss small details on the images.To get crystal clear indoor and outdoor photos you'll probably have to buy a higher end camera.

Reviews.Title: I use the voice memo feature in my work
Reviews.Author: Ron Hiatt
Reviews.Content: I bought it because of the voice memo feature.  Not as durable as I like.  I have bought several.  But it is inexpensive - I perform a lot of structural inspections,

Reviews.Title: Great for Photography class.
Reviews.Author: DH
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my high school junior daughter, who is taking photography.  She loves it and it help fulfill her assignments.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: J. W. Boyes
Reviews.Content: This particular camera was purchased as a gift and will be given on New Year's day.  I did purchase one for myself about 18 months ago and have liked it very much.  I did find that the number of features slows me down a little and I am confident that I don't get full value out of them.  One feature that I discovered by accident is that you can pick the focus/light spot by tapping on the touchscreen and in about 3 seconds it will take a picture with that as the focal point and the light and/or flash suitable for that spot.  That is a feature that I frequently use but did not discover in the quick reference guide.  I just wish I had time to sit down and read the whole manual while being able to put it to use at the same time - that just hasn't happened - my fault, not the camera's.The story on this purchase is that my daughter forgot to bring her camera at thanksgiving so I let her use mine.  The basic operation is intuitive and she was taking pictures in minutes without any reference to the manual at all.  She liked her pictures so I bought her one for Christmas.  Her previous camera does not have drivers for Windows 7 and she did not have a card reader to get the pictures on to her computer.  I am confident she will like the camera.One small thing is that I felt the camera overexposed a little on both natural light and flash.  It is possible to set an offest for either mode independently.  I set it to underexpose by about 3/4 of a stop and now like the pictures I get.  I realize that exposure to some extent is a matter of taste.  I have been told by photographers much smarter than myself that underexposed photos can be repaired, overexposed photos can not.  I don't do any of this repair so it really shouldn't matter to me but if I ever got the time to work with one of the photo analysis programs I would have pictures I can work with.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Images
Reviews.Author: English Teacher
Reviews.Content: I have been fighting with this camera for a year now.  My images are constantly blurry.  I have tried every setting offered.  The view will be clear and as soon as I click it, the lens blurs as it snaps.  There is no rhyme or reason to it.  I think perhaps mine is defective, but I kept thinking it was a setting issue.  I don't live in the US, so easy return was not an option.  I just kept hoping I'd figure it out.  It is generally easy to operate and has several functions.  But, it takes terrible pictures.  And, no, it is not my unsteady hand.  I get great pictures with the cheap camera i bought my daughter at the same time I bought this.  If you are looking to buy a point and shoot, buy one at a store over the counter from a person who can demonstrate it.  Then takes lots of pics in those first days and, if you get bad ones, don't assume it is a setting.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Barbara Countryman
Reviews.Content: Once again haven't really used the product yet. Took a couple of pictures in the house that turned out great.

Reviews.Title: great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: joel barter
Reviews.Content: great camera. the touch screen takes some getting used to but overall easy to use.. my wife loves her new camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Design flaw
Reviews.Author: Mahesh N. Iyer "Nature Lover"
Reviews.Content: The motor has a design flaw. Shutter quits opening. Pictures are great but Nikon has to fix the motor issue.This is the third camera that I exchanged.

Reviews.Title: love love my nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: brenda barnhill
Reviews.Content: i just love my nikon s4300 camera i bought it as a replacement for a my first nikon cool pix camera that was mistakenly ruined an it just crushed me because i really loved the first one also so i searched the amazon site and found my new one (used new one) for less than half of the price as my old one and the good part is that my new one is an upgrade to the one that i ruined. the reason the new one was so cheap was it did not come with a charger and luckily it was the same charger as my old one whoo hoo lucky for me and i love the picture quality and the editing features and the touchscreen is a plus. i have seen bad reviews about this camera and i can't understand why, i have had two of them and all i can say is the quality of the pictures are outstanding. the question is would i purchase another one yes i would

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal on a great camera
Reviews.Author: Kira Butler
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing deal and a great camera.  The company was very gracious in honoring a once in a lifetime deal, and I am thankful for it.  The camera takes great pictures, it may take some time to get use to but it is very easy to use.  I did not get purple, It came in sliver - it didn't matter.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: leon sikes
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. this is my second one,first one stolen. see! everybody want one ever if they can buy their own. i bought  mine from Cameta both times. very fast service and good people to deal with. good service like Amazon .

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER
Reviews.Author: Phillip Velednitskiy
Reviews.Content: BEST CAMERA EVER. LOTS OF FEATURES SND VERY GOOD PICTURE QUALITY. BEST BEST BEST BEST BEST BRST BEST BEST CEMERA EVER

Reviews.Title: very good items
Reviews.Author: jose alt. ruiz espinal
Reviews.Content: This product fulfilled with what I expected, I feel very satisfied with the purchase of this product. thousand thanks hope to do business again.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased.
Reviews.Author: Brittney
Reviews.Content: I hadn't even used it and I went to take pictures for my prom and it didn't work. It looks like its stuck in zoom, can't be fixed either. Waiste of my $150

Reviews.Title: It is a very good produc.
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Everything is looking good, the pictures are amazing and it is a nice camera !!! The price is compatible with the product and quality.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: girlnextdoor44 "girlnextdoor44"
Reviews.Content: Although I haven't used it a lot, due to my forgetfulness, the pictures that I have taken are very nice.

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen is useful. Non-standard, proprietary USB port sucks. Bad at auto-rotating pictures
Reviews.Author: wowsuchprofile
Reviews.Content: It works fine. Everything is fairly standard. However, two major complaints;1. The proprietary USB connector annoys, because its SO CLOSE to being mini-USB yet it some non-standard connector instead. Having to carry around it's special cable is the only way to charge it. It'd be much better if it used micro or mini USB for charging, or also came with a standalone battery charger (one where you pop the battery out and plug into a separate charger).2. It is awful at automatically rotating photos, and after using this camera I always need to spend a good 10 minutes manually rotating the photos to their correct orientation. Annoying.Other then that, everything is ok. No other complaints.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: monique11
Reviews.Content: great quality picture especially indoors is mostly where i take pictures,the aspects of this item i like most is the features its a touch screen,easy menu to read is a good thing ,and the tripod a timer of 10 seconds,and the scene's is ajustable,if need charging can do it computer or wall you will be pleased,i use it to take photos for my facebook outtings and so forth,i have used several cameras but this one is for keeps you can adjust the lightening for in doors i do use firworks more in scenes but potriate is good for the natural colors are great,this camera is attractive but the bad reviews are nothing if you havent explored it is a good little camera the greatest is the out look all together is easy for beginners there is nothing to dislike,ask more of its performance would be great.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4300 Delivers Quality Performance
Reviews.Author: Tall_Tiger
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Nikon Coolpix S4300 because I previously used a Nikon Coolpix L6 model.  I was completely satisfied with the previous model.  The newer model has some major improvements that make this camera a very good choice.  The best part of these Nikon Coolpix line of digital cameras is the battery life when compared to other cameras!  These models perform much longer than most any other camera I have tried.  The quality of the photos are very professional.  Don't be fooled by the price ....this model works very well consistently just like the previous Nikon Coolpix that I had for nearly ten years.  It is nice and compact.  Amazon.com continuously selects the best models for nearly every item they sell.  Another good reason to buy from Amazon.com is the competitive pricing and the lightning-fast delivery after the sale.  I highly recommend this item to everyone who reads this testimonial.  If you are in the market for a quality digital camera, I honestly believe that this model will perform to your highest expectations!

Reviews.Title: Camera without Flash
Reviews.Author: Nathalia J.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago, and i gave it to my mom as a gift, but what a surprise.. the flash didnt work; i live out of usa, so i couldnt return it, i took it to a special center for revision and it cost me almost the same that the camera. Too bad, not recomended.

Reviews.Title: Quality, Quality, Quality---I lLOVE my Nikon
Reviews.Author: Gloria Saltzman
Reviews.Content: I rated My Nikon COOLPIX S4300 16 MP Digital Camera with 5 stars because the quality of the pictures far out shined the quality of the older Sony Cyber-Shot that I had.  I took my Nikon to my 50th high school reunion and I am thrilled with how clear the pictures are.  Those memories will last forever.  Thank you for such a high quality product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Ana Amelia Fracalossi
Reviews.Content: The quality of images is excellent, it is easy to handle it, the battery lasts for days, the different options for color is fantastic and it has a very good size, easy to carry on.

Reviews.Title: Battery didn't last more than 60 days
Reviews.Author: Kathleen O'Leary Garbarino
Reviews.Content: I love the camera however, within 2 months the battery was completely dead and not taking a charge.  I only used the camera a dozen times and charged it once. It will cost me another $40 for a replacement battery.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Pocket Camera !
Reviews.Author: Debbie J. Hayward
Reviews.Content: For someone who wants to carry a camera in their pocket so they can catch photos on the fly, this is a great little pocket camera.It has good clarity and does great macro shots which is what I use it for. It can also take pictures in low light without the flash andthey come out amazingly clear. It is easy to use, easy to understand and very convenient. Can't go wrong for a small camera and the price is nice as well.  I would suggest an extra battery so you can have a spare for long days of shooting because you have to charge the battery while in the camera and that puts you out of commission for a while. You need to be able to charge at night when you are not using the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: bill modesitt
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, because I wanted a smaller camera I could carry in my pocket and yet, take great pictures, view pictures with touch screen and store a lot of pictures.  This camera does all of that, plus it has a 6X wide zoom and 16.0 megapixels.  It's fabulous. I had the Nikon 4100 touch screen with 5x zoom and 12 megapixels, and this is so much better and it has so many more attributes you'd have to buy it to see all of them.  Easy to charge and the charge lasts a pretty significant time.  If you are taking a lot of pictures in one day, the charge will probably last one whole day.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam, but DON'T BUY AMAZON REC SD CARD!!!
Reviews.Author: Grateful J
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY AMAZON'S RECOMMENDED SD CARD.  I really love my camera, it's great for a student who wants to take general photos at parties.  I'm getting ready for vacation and realized my camera will neither turn on nor charge.  Rushing to fix before my vaca and the Nikon rep told me I was using an SD Card that was not suited for the camera.  The SD card killed my camera, but Nikon is willing to fix the problem since it's within the 1 year warranty period.

Reviews.Title: My Second Coolpix Camera
Reviews.Author: Dianna Bailey-Thompson
Reviews.Content: This camera is similar to my old Coolpix but has a touch screen which is a nice enhancement.  I haven't used all the features yet but so far I'm happy I didn't get a different brand.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: JOE W.
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon p500 ( a big model with all the bells and whistles for us old time photogs)  For a point and shoot camera with a litle  zoom it works great.  good pix quality and easy to move to video.

Reviews.Title: Had one before and it broke when dropped.  This time I got a drop insurance coverage!!!l. Like the camera.
Reviews.Author: Dylie K
Reviews.Content: Yes I would recommend camera, BUT buy the insurance coverage in case it's dropped.  So, here is the six more words.

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I found that you can take pictures black and white with a one color pop.. did not know this when i bought it. very satissfied with this except i just lost my charger :/

Reviews.Title: upgraded
Reviews.Author: debra gerdau
Reviews.Content: I was on the prowl for a new digital camera, I have 3 children that I photograph often. I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: RW "RW"
Reviews.Content: I had a previous camera fail and repairs would have been as much as purchasing a new one.  I found this refurbished camera for a very reasonable price and it was an upgrade to my prior camera.  It is very simple to use and quality of the photos is great.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and Good quality
Reviews.Author: Youngmi Kwon
Reviews.Content: Resolution (max 16M) is good.I wanted HD video and pictures, and this works very well for the purpose.It is very easy to use and the touch screen is wide and big enoughto handle touches.Finally, connecting to PC is direct and easy.As a secondary portable camera, I want to recommend this !!

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: K. Carlson ""where am I""
Reviews.Content: The pictures are good.  Ease of use for the most part is good.  Reviews say this is a wifi camera but I cannot find anything about wifi in the manual or on the camera itself.  I did see specific storage cards that were upwards of $89 that said something about wifi compatible, maybe that's what I needed.  I'm not sure, just dissappointed because I based my decision on price and features.  I'd have picked a different one based on that single fact, as that was the most important thing to me, next was tying for ease of use and picture quality.  Considering sending back but not sure my options.  Will have to check into it.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, low pixels
Reviews.Author: Rachel Hardwick
Reviews.Content: Camera was about what I expected, I do wish I had known it came with a camera case and memory card, I had bought them separately.  Contrarily, the included accessories made it a great deal.

Reviews.Title: The Nikon Coolpix S4300 is a camera you will like
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Scionti
Reviews.Content: I like the touch screen and it takes nice pictures.  It's easy to use and it's very nice for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4300 16 MP Digital Camera w/ 6x zoom NIKKOR Glass
Reviews.Author: TJ "sweetiepie"
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement camers for one that was lost on vacation.  I ordered the same one again because it's easy to use, takes great photos and video, fits well into your pocket or purse, has many esasy to use functions for non professionals like myself.  we now own two of these cameras...one for my husband and one for myself.

Reviews.Title: new toy
Reviews.Author: Misty Mauldin
Reviews.Content: I love  the  new  nikon coolpix, the  quality  and  color  are  perfect, cant  wait  to use  it on  our  vacations and  taking  shots  of  our dogs.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: size, ease, pics. all is good with my 3rd coolpix. I am a happy picture taker on my walks in the park.

Reviews.Title: Parts falling off. DO NOT BUY! Not my favorite little camera - I have broken one before.
Reviews.Author: Eve UrAlly "Ur Ally"
Reviews.Content: UPDATE to Review:s4300 piece of junk as well. The thumb hold keeps falling off - NIKON doesn't seem to have their parts group prepared to handle the junk. Should have learned not to get a second one. BUYER BEWARE!!S4100 with LCD Screen LEAK. No broken glass. Apparently pushing on the screen as it is a touchscreen ruined it. due to Have to be super careful with the LCD back. REPAIR options were slow and turned out to be about the same amount as what I paid for the camera. So it's trash.  Its not the easiest camera to use and has some funky software useability layouts. I have learned to work around. BUT I will buy a different model next time.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Mimi Haught
Reviews.Content: So far so good, it's easy to use, but haven't used it to much yet. Looking forward to many good pictures.

Reviews.Title: nice small camera
Reviews.Author: Roberta J. Rose
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgrade my camera for upcoming trips and have always liked Nikon.  The price was right and so far it is working out well.

Reviews.Title: lovely gift
Reviews.Author: Jahvere Gordon
Reviews.Content: brought it for my girlfriend and she has not put it down since. lovely camera. its very cool to use.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures. It has a nice size screen and it's easy to use. I like the long life of the battery too! Purple is my favorite color!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sheena Jones "S.K."
Reviews.Content: Got this camera much cheaper than if it were brand new but it looked new! It's small and touch screen is cool. LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Great fast deliver good quality product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small carry camera and this fits the bill just fine.  I  unfortunately have spoiled myself with my DSLR for picture quality

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing pictures! Has eye fi availability which I recommend :) comes w case and memory card. Wonderful gift for myself. Came quickly :)

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Sharon A. Pevec
Reviews.Content: this is the coolest camera. it is easy to use with many types of photo options. comes with all you need to start your album. attractive and fast ship. my son bought one for his wife after seeing ours.

Reviews.Title: Very slow
Reviews.Author: Bleon
Reviews.Content: I like the look of the camera and the picture quality, but it takes quite a bit to save each picture and its a bit slow with all commands

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Isabel Ortega
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I love that it comes in white and it just take wonderful pictures. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S4300
Reviews.Author: sueanne behrens-rausch
Reviews.Content: Love how I have kept it in my purse for a month and it saved the day for 2 birthday parties.  The one I got kept a charge for a lot longer then expected.  I would definitely suggest this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4300
Reviews.Author: Linda Mullen
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera because it is red and has a touch screen.  I have been surprised by what good pictures it takes.  Pictures are clear and the color is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Jackson
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!! Easy to use...Long battery life...Sturdy (I've dropped it twice!) I would highly recommend this camera!! Purple too!

Reviews.Title: Great condition!
Reviews.Author: Marie Detes
Reviews.Content: The camera come in the condition that was posted with everything else I needed in the package. I was very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Bev G
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because I got it at a good price and I loved the color. The picture quality is better than I expected and I wanted a camera that had a video app as well. It works great, I would highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Love my camera!
Reviews.Author: happy with my white teeth!
Reviews.Content: Truly love my camera! The white color gives it an expensive, slick feel and the camera does an awesome job at capturing moments! The touchscreen works perfectly, and I could not be more satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Great looking Camera
Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the features that I was looking for at an affordable price.  Large viewing area.  Quality construction.  Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: gj
Reviews.Content: It's slim, with lots of features.  The zoom works very well, and the 16 MP gives great detail.  It took a little while to get used to not touching the screen with the camera on (it takes a picture), but, in the right situation, that's a nice feature.Battery life is a little shorter than I'd like, though.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ana Luisa
Reviews.Content: This has been a fantastic purchase and is a product I highly recommend:This has been a fantastic purchase and is a product I highly recommend:

Reviews.Title: Awesome Pictures
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: This takes wonderful pictures and has great features. It is very user friendly.  My only complaint is that the video only works outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul W. Lotts
Reviews.Content: Excellent bundle value for such a high quality camera. Color choices were wide. This camera has a touch screen which most others of this type don't have. Pictures have high resolution. The shipper was prompt and sold it for $20 below other sites.

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera!
Reviews.Author: jeannie polonski
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie- this camera is easy to use right from the box-  I needed it for Ebay Pictures- and it is PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: Camera is the best
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Imholt
Reviews.Content: This camera takes the best pictures.  Clear and wonderful pictures great for the everyday scrap Booker.  I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: N. Aaron
Reviews.Content: I wanted something newer and a little sleeker than my old camera and this was perfect. I love the touchscreen capabilities and the zoom is great!  I've only taken inside pictures so far, but I can already tell outside pictures are going to be phenomenal!  I noticed what a few other reviewers said about inside pics not being great, but I think they are actually pretty good, you just have to be patient.  Like others have said, if you want something that takes perfect indoor pictures you have to shell out quite a bit more money.  I'm happy with my little camera!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a good price
Reviews.Author: M. Ramakrishnan
Reviews.Content: First Nikon product. Replaced older Canon models (A530, A580).Quite a lot of features (technology keeps changing). Have not yet tried all the features but very happy with the pictures taken so far. Video quality is also very good (better than the Canon models we had).Good thing is it has rechargeable batteries (no need to take AA batteries), the batteries do last longer than AA (though there are those Li Energizer batteries that do last long).Like this camera so far for simple photography (not a professional photographer).

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: bobingalax
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great value for the money. Easy to use and takes a great pic! Have used other Nikon products and this one is the same good quality.

Reviews.Author: YA
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier by purchasing this camera. I was not sure but I am glad I did, I love that it a touch screen, it would be nice if it came with an extra little pen but other then that is a great camera! :)

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: Wendy Monson
Reviews.Content: The service was great and on time.  Product arrived promptly and just as wasstated in the description.  My granddaughter was ectatic.

Reviews.Title: It fits
Reviews.Author: Robert Tripp "Rob"
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera that plays its role well. My wife wanted a point and shoot that she could drop in her purse and not worry too much about.  Pictures are what you would expect from a camera of this class...nothing earth shattering but due to its size, its always there for her and allows her to get pictures she would have otherwise missed. It's a solid performer that appeared to be well built.

Reviews.Title: Camera that gets a good work out
Reviews.Author: sebring driver
Reviews.Content: Up dated from an older Nikon I like the larger viewing area  This one has its own battery Hope it lasts for a good while. Does take great pictures for a nominal cost

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Robbie W. Robichau "Grad student"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with it. It takes good pictures and I like how easy it is to use. Good price

Reviews.Title: Nikon S4300
Reviews.Author: Mickey Robinson
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that had a quick sutter speed, small and sleek, and touch screen. I was very impressed with the camera--at first. It arrived promptly. My only complaint is that I will never return to a re-chargerable battery camera again. It's very inconvenient. I prefer AA or AAA battery cameras instead. The camera functions fine, but my mistake was not researching what type of battery this camera took. If this camera was battery operatored (AA), it would be perfect. Would I order another one? No. I still recommend it. It got 3 stars because of my own preferences.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: RP
Reviews.Content: Overall I liked this product. Though I've not used  that much.  Battery seems ok.  If any of you found this product in less than $90 you can buy.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: bridget
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and it got here exactly when it said it would.i haven't had  any problems with this product

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA FOR GENERAL PICTURE TAKING
Reviews.Author: bowoman
Reviews.Content: It has been a wonderful camera-similar to my old one and very easy to operate. The battery life is really cool, it is easy to transfer pictures to computer and I like being able to have the manual online.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for a great product!
Reviews.Author: Salvatore A. Pace M.D.
Reviews.Content: It was the camera that I needed to fill my armamentarium of photo equipment. I had a full range of Nikon large body cameras but needed something that could easily fit in a pocket and that could be used without large bags and all the other accessories. This camera fits the bill. Excellent quality, good images, easy to use and software all in the package. A great buy for a great product a a remarkably low price.

Reviews.Title: Great little point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: This camera fits all my needs when it comes to traveling and all you want is something you can carry, pull out and KaBAM, take pictures or movies.
