Don't expect high dollar pics you get from a high dollar camera.  Remember this is a compact, point and shoot camera...No extra gagets to carry, or big camera bags.  Great for anyone who wants a good pic or movie but doesn't want to lug around a big camera.  The pics are great!  I recommend to anyone who wants just this.  Excellent Point and shoot camera.  :):)

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4300 Digital Camera from Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest camera.  I had one similar to this, but unfortunately lost it while on vacation.  My husband purchased this for me for my birthday.  My favorite subject while taking pictures and videos is my 2 year old granddaughter.  This camera is so easy to use and the videos are great.  I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a camera that is simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Brandi "Sometimes the most important words ar...
Reviews.Content: I am so thrilled with this camera! It takes great pictures, is easy to use, and the touch screen function is simply fun! I have had it for just about a month now and I never leave home without it.  Works great taking pictures at my kids' sports functions and for just shooting pics of the kids around the house.  I would definitely buy this one again!

Reviews.Title: review for nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: This was an up grade for me. Had a nikon before this purchase. Love the camera. The pictures taken with this camera, are wonderful. The video function is great. The ease of being able to touch the screen to take the picture, is great. I would tell anyone who is in the market for a new camera, this is the one you should buy.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: texeo
Reviews.Content: Gave as gift to our granddaughter and she loves the camera.  Takes both photos and videos with it with ease.  Her mom says she has been very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful camera
Reviews.Author: John Reavis Jr. "XRedleg"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely great camera. Very small but has many advanced features.  Gave it as a birthday gift to a granddaughter and she loves it!!

Reviews.Title: so
Reviews.Author: Mandy "jajaja"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes nikon quality photos. i was actually rather impressed with the quality for the price!Wonderful i got the all white camera, very classy color

Reviews.Title: Poor Product
Reviews.Author: JCronin
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift. I didn't even have it a month and the viewing screen started turning everything pink. I paid to have it sent it to Nikon and they wouldn't fix it because I didn't have the original receipt (again, it was a gift). DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! It never took good pictures and the company isn't willing to take responsibility for a poor product.

Reviews.Title: 1 use and now it will not charge
Reviews.Author: tbillow
Reviews.Content: Used the camera went to recharge with supplied cables and it will not charge.  It is outside of the 15 days i had to return it to the store so now I have to deal with Nikons warranty service.

Reviews.Title: Garbage!!!!!  One star to get it on the rating chart NO star from us!
Reviews.Author: Jan Gortler Small "junkjewels"
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this as a gift May 2012 and it  died in July under the warrantee  we shipped it to Melville, NY and they repaired it.  Oct 2013 camera is dead and out of warrantee.  It will cost us the cost of the camera to repair it.  Stay clear of this one.  We got the LEMON!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't last!
Reviews.Author: pianolady
Reviews.Content: Pictures were ok, but compare to other brands of cameras I own (that are still working after  many years of use by me and my now 7 years old son)This camera lasted 1 year of random use!!!!Never again buying another NIKON product!!!

Reviews.Title: Shutter lag is AWFUL
Reviews.Author: B. Widner
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take pictures of my children.....but the shutter lag is so bad that I barely catch smiles and/or them even looking at the camera!  I even tried taking it out with friends for my birthday and it felt like we had to hold smiles for a full 10 seconds before the picture actually snapped!  it's not a bad price but not worth the trouble...I put it up and went back to using my old camera!

Reviews.Title: My old nikon gave out
Reviews.Author: A. MAE LEVAN
Reviews.Content: I liked the ease of using my old one and it took great pictures and the new one has been even better

Reviews.Title: nice camera overall.
Reviews.Author: Terrie L Book
Reviews.Content: Camera shoots out of focus alot and selecting shooting modes can be difficult and complicated.  But for the price, it is a god deal.

Reviews.Title: my new best friend
Reviews.Author: Abigail
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. It takes great pictures and has a great zoom with it. I am so glad I found this.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Linda B. Macapayag "Purple5683Cats"
Reviews.Content: I received it quickly and was excited, at first.  I only got this because my old Nikon Coolpix broke.  I find that the touch screen can be difficult to work with and is "touchy".  Not sure the pictures are any better than my old Nikon Coolpix either, which was disappointing.  I would much rather use my old Nikon Coolpix.  The camera itself is a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Great quality with multple settings.  Make sure you order memory card and case.  Fits in shirt or pants pockwts.

Reviews.Title: Very poorly designed.
Reviews.Author: Richard Sullivan
Reviews.Content: The pictures and video are good. You can NOT record while the AC cord is plugged in. The AC plug is on the bottom and makes using a tripod very difficult. The battery and card are on the bottom as well. The way the door slides it makes it difficult to grasp and the memory card. You can not record more than 8 min vid segments at a time. I bought this camera because it was special price at $62. If my Samsung I purchased 7 years ago had better picture and video quality I would prefer that camera over this newer Nikon. Sad but true.

Reviews.Title: Broke after one fall
Reviews.Author: Mommy_2010
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for 2 month. Its fell only once from the coffee table to wood floor and its start taking blank pictures. Quality of the pictures are not great anyway. What a waste of money. Never going to buy Nikon ever again.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4300
Reviews.Author: charlouise
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice little digital camera, takes very clear pictures.  However, I have found that the HDMI cable is missing from the package. What do I do about that?

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Nerry
Reviews.Content: This camera works really great in good lighting. I just got it and I'm still trying to find my way with the scene settings for good night time pictures. The ones I tried were terrible. Nevertheless, still an okay camera, the touch feature is really great as well.

Reviews.Title: A nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Colleen Werdenie-Rose
Reviews.Content: it's a nice little camera. It does exactly want I needed  it to do. It may not take the perfect pictures but it takes very good pictures. I would recommend this item

Reviews.Title: Cute and funtional
Reviews.Author: Luzmila
Reviews.Content: The product, besides being cute (for included accessories) is a product that covered in my expectations greatly. I already proved in a trip that I did to Eastern Island and the landscapes pictures taken, were amazing. I really recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: CL1186
Reviews.Content: Just the camera I was looking for and I got it as the bundle which saved me $$$!!! Paid way less for this bundle then I would have paid for the camera itself!!

Reviews.Title: FLASH IN THE WAY! WHAT A STUPID IDEA TO PUT THE FLASH ON THE RIGHT SIDE!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Holder "J P"
Reviews.Content: I don't know how you hold your cameras, but I hold them in a way that it hides the flash completely. Most cameras have the flash on the left side, this one is on the right... bad design

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: tlh103
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly. I started the return process less than 6 hours of receivingit TODAY. I honestly thought I would break the screen just trying to set the camera up. The stylus was no help at all. I do NOT recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: I believe it would be Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Timothy Lipscomb
Reviews.Content: I have not use it yet.  hopefully it will fulfill what I need it for.  This is going to be use for my son Graduation

Reviews.Title: Great Service on Return Nikon Coolpix S4300
Reviews.Author: Erwin Kittner
Reviews.Content: I notified PlatinumBuys on my 1st purchase of camera being totally dead.  I sent camera back to seller and within 8 days I had a brand new camera that worked great.  Thank you for your fine service.  Your company should be rated high on customer service (A+) and integrity (A+).  We will definitely return for purchases in the very near future. Keep up the great work and service!E.KittnerFort Wayne, IN

Reviews.Title: cool pics
Reviews.Author: Jorge Ruales
Reviews.Content: The camera has effects and features really util.. the pics are good for family and friends trip not for professionnal

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Marie Ledezma
Reviews.Content: I received the camera with all noted accessories without any problems. The dvd gives alot of instructions because this little  camera has alot of bells and whistles. The pictures are great!  Quite an upgrade from my 5 yr old Kodak that gave out.

Reviews.Title: bad quality of the battery
Reviews.Author: Pan Dan
Reviews.Content: The battery is broken before long. I have to pay about 23 dollars to buy a new one. I don't know why it is broken so quickly, and doubt the quality of the whole product.

Reviews.Title: nice camara
Reviews.Author: dennis giancoli
Reviews.Content: Really nice pics only problem I'm not sure which button does what. With time I'm sure I'll master it but in the meantime trying my best.

Reviews.Title: Much more that I expected!
Reviews.Author: J. Vass
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! Great pictures and easy look back! Can't wait to take more pictures! Gave an exact explanation on what the piece was before I purchased, right on target!

Reviews.Title: An honest review of why I hate it...
Reviews.Author: Cristi Snapp
Reviews.Content: The bottom line is that the pictures are beyond poor quality. I did not purchase mine on Amazon as I did not want to risk the product being damaged in shipment, but I bought one for myself as a Christmas gift last year. I was impressed with the first few pictures, especially the quality of the flash (I have always been a fan of Nikon's flashes, which was I chose this product in the first place). However, that is just about the only good thing I have to say about this product. I have tried not to hate it, using the excuse that I was just used to my DSLR and I had to remember that this was a smaller camera. Anyway, here's the truth:1.) Outdoors -- This camera takes great outdoor shots...in the day light...as long as the subject is standing perfectly still.2.) Indoors -- This camera does not take clear indoor shots at all! It doesn't matter what the lighting is, or whether or not the subject is standing still. And the bigger problem is, it only gets worse over time. I have had mine for a year now and have used it only 4 times and each time the pictures come out more and more blurred.3.) The touch screen -- This is more of a stylus screen. The touch screen will NOT work with the touch of a finger, you must use the stylus that comes with it, so if you purchase this despite the reviews, make sure you do not accidentally throw the stylus out!The camera is small and compact and lightweight and thin, which makes it easy to carry, which was what I was looking for, but the picture quality is horrific! I am very disappointed! Nikon still has a few bugs to work out before they get this "point and shoot" thing down.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Martha Stewart "Martha S."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a couple of years ago and am very happy with the quality of the pictures and that the battery holds its charge for a very long time.  The focus works quickly without delay. I wanted to purchase another Nikon Coolpix as a gift and researched the newer Coolpix models.  Some of the reviews indicated problems with the shutter getting stuck as well as other issues. Decided to stick with the Coolpix S4300.

Reviews.Title: I was not impressed!
Reviews.Author: Adriana
Reviews.Content: I was less than impressed with this camera.  It is a touch screen camera which is sometimes too sensitive and sometimes not sensitive enough.  So, when I want to review my pictures, I have a hard time.  In general, I expected a better quality product.

Reviews.Title: No option for zero stars! I hate this camera!
Reviews.Author: Cathy A Rice
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I was told it would be great for concert footage, one of my must haves in a camera. Even after technical support and trying all of their recommended settings, I was not able to get a single decent picture with over three hundred concert shots! My old camera did ok, but was damaged in a fire, last time I try to make a "change for the better".  What a waste of my money!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4300
Reviews.Author: Boots
Reviews.Content: I have not received the camera, so I am unable to rate it at this time.  I look forward to its arrival.

Reviews.Title: camera wont charge
Reviews.Author: bass entshusuastr
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon COOLPIX S4300 16 MP Digital Camera with 6x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and 3-inch Touchscreen LCD (Red)the camera take very lovely pic it has a rechargeable battery I charge the battery 2 time in 3 months that i have the camera I was trying to charge the  camera for my Birthday and it just stop charging it will now power on I am very upset.

Reviews.Title: DISAPPOINTMENT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Meronique K. Hammler
Reviews.Content: PLEASE:Take your time and read the other comments on these Coolpix camera series!!!!ALSO:The Nikon company, when I contacted them, acted as if they had "NEVER" heard of such "ISSUES" with this line of their cameras!!!!DO:Send it back and/or shop for another camera NOT in this series or like me you may become SADDLED WITH IT FOREVER!!!!SIGNED:SAD and DISAPPOINTED!!!!
